info.name: Apprentice Witch
info.description: Apprentice Witch from Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

element.name: Apprentice Witch
element.source: Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

description.p: The ways of witchery are mysterious and often guarded by its practitioners. Whether you sought it out or a witch recognized something in you, you came to apprentice for a witch or coven. Under their tutelage, you were introduced to Obojima's folk magic tradition, where you learned the rudiments of potions and other magical preparations. Although you may have trained under one for some time, you never officially joined one of the covens and are considered a witch without a crest. For more on witch covens, see page 19.

ul.li: Equipment: Alchemist's supplies, 9 common ingredients (which you know the attributes for), a hat or robe from your time as an apprentice, and 9 gold flowers.

element.name: Feature: Sibling Student
element.source: Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

description.p: You have a close and trustworthy friend who studied under the same witch as you and has now made it into one of the six main covens. When needed, they act as your liaison to the coven or covens they're connected to.
